channel.title: Re: Tavlonia PK Economy - Unique Unseen Features - INSTANT PK - Nice PvM - CWARS
channel.description:
[URL=http://"//www.tavlonia.uphero.com"] Website (Temporary)[/URL] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/nf773o0uta0ef5j/TavloniaV3.jar?dl=0"]Play Now[/URL] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/nf773o0uta0ef5j/TavloniaV3.jar?dl=0"]Download[/URL] If they don't work please use this download link: [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download/gwte7xio3u8ahvg/TavloniaV3.jar"]Download 2[/URL]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OnNT0Dt.png[/img]
[SIZE=2]Tavlonia is a RuneScape Private Server hosted on an extremely stable, large and expensive dedicated server to ensure maximum enjoyment for our players. This is what makes Tavlonia such an amazing lagg free MMORPG to maximise the quality of gameplay for our PKers. At Tavlonia, PKing is our main feature and speciality. Our flawless switching and high quality HD resolution helps to encourage our best PKers to shine through! However, Tavlonia is not only based around PKing - To ensure that all of our players and to reach a wider range of players, we have created epic PvM and skilling systems. We have every main boss that Runescape and other RSPS's have BUT we have also created our own cusstom bosses which drop some of our UNIQUE custom Tavlonia items. These Items can also be obtained through donations. Tavlonia is a game created by gamers, for gamers. We ensure that whatever you suggest on our forums (within reason) gets added successfully to our server. We, unlike every other runescape private server, we listen to our players as they are of extreme importance.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]Let us begin to see an insight of what gaming at Tavlonia is like:[/SIZE] [SIZE=3][COLOR="#FF0000"] Player VS Player (PvP) Combat[/COLOR] [/SIZE] [SIZE=2]For beginner PKers, we have a spawn tab of which they can choose FOR FREE a Melee Set, Hybrid Set, Mage Set, Range Set, Pure Set and ::Food! [/SIZE] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/izoORSo.png[/img]
[SIZE=2]PvP at Tavlonia is our main speciality. We encourage our gamers to PK as much as possible, and that is why you will find PKing at Tavlonia is probably the most Advanced type of PKing you will find on a Runescape Private Server. Not only do we have so many various PK areas (Including: Safe PvP (Do not Lose Items), High Risk PK (Minimum of 50m to enter), Multi PvP and Single PvP). But we also have unique features such as a unique[COLOR="#00FF00"] KILLSTREAK system [/COLOR] where if a successful PKer kills many people in a row, he will obtain a killstreak which will be announced to players. He will therefore, gain more PvP Tokens and More GP per kill! However, a PKer with a killstreak is also worth more money to other players. He will become a bounty target to everyone online! Therefore, if you kill somebody who is a bounty, you will receive more rewards for your kill!
[/SIZE] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Fq6kkgf.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lY8svaE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r9N2RoN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/E5E8sD0.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/MruQnUr.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bshK8wu.png[/img]
[SIZE=2][COLOR="#00FF00"]As a PK Server, we have adapted our shops to suit the needs of PKers through suggestions on our forums. We have many shops, here are some of them: [/SIZE] [/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cifPx9I.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TY0wSop.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vDRYLbY.png[/img]
[COLOR="#00FF00"][SIZE=2]Here is our F2P PK Area and our High Risk PK Area[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bk2OZqA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PRurLp6.png[/img]
[SIZE=2]Now... For all of you who are too scared for player vs player combat. Ofcourse Tavlonia provides Flawless PvM for you! [/SIZE][SIZE=3][COLOR="#00FF00"]PvM At Tavlonia[/COLOR][/SIZE] [SIZE=2]Our PvM system provides bosses from all over RuneScape from easy bosses for the Newbies to hard bosses for the solid gamers! However, Tavlonia also has it's Custom, unique bosses which are Explicit to tavlonia! Here is some pics of our PvM [/SIZE] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/v4iev6I.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HOo9PbU.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lN2pVeI.png[/img]
[SIZE=3][COLOR="#00FF00"] [SIZE=2]We also have our own Custom Developed Castle Wars ! It is identical to Runescape ! Pefectly working, with rewards... you won't find that anywhere other than at Tavlonia...
[/SIZE] [/COLOR][/SIZE] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FmVS336.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Be6zWlm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wxu1zEe.png[/img] [SIZE=2][COLOR="#00FF00"]We have recently developed a new Rank System and added a few custom ranks (ALL WITH ICONS)![/COLOR] We have the following:
Owner/Creator Manager Administrator Moderator Player Support Promoter Bug Finder GFX Artist
So, if you haven't already clicked our links, i suggest that you should:
[/SIZE] [img]http://i.imgur.com/S40gPWK.png[/img]
(RECENTLY ADDED) [img]http://i.imgur.com/MruQnUr.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bshK8wu.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/550aCJM.png[/img]
some updates off of the top of my head:
Add bounty hunter Add Castle Wars With Rewards & Tickets Add dungeoning levels Add soulwars Add 2 new PK areas Add 2 New bosses Add 35 New Customs Add 6 New Shops Add a whole new Rank system Add Achievements Fix 99999999999999 Bugs and Glitches AND dupes that come with Matrix? Add a unique referral system Add BlackMark system Add No customs allowed into Edgeville PK New High Risk PK (100m minimum risk) fix all doors Range Clipping many new commands 2 New Donator Zones Donator Drop Rates increased Donator PKP increased Fixed rock crab dupe Fixed Teleport Dupe Fixed the jail bug Fixed 4 OP weapons Fixed special attacks for: Dragon Scimitar, DDS, abyssal Whip and BGS

item.description:
@djfinger1 wrote:

Website (Temporary)
Play Now
Download
If they don’t work please use this download link:
Download 2

[SIZE=2]Tavlonia is a RuneScape Private Server hosted on an extremely stable, large and expensive dedicated server to ensure maximum enjoyment for our players. This is what makes Tavlonia such an amazing lagg free MMORPG to maximise the quality of gameplay for our PKers. At Tavlonia, PKing is our main feature and speciality. Our flawless switching and high quality HD resolution helps to encourage our best PKers to shine through! However, Tavlonia is not only based around PKing - To ensure that all of our players and to reach a wider range of players, we have created epic PvM and skilling systems. We have every main boss that Runescape and other RSPS’s have BUT we have also created our own cusstom bosses which drop some of our UNIQUE custom Tavlonia items. These Items can also be obtained through donations.
Tavlonia is a game created by gamers, for gamers. We ensure that whatever you suggest on our forums (within reason) gets added successfully to our server. We, unlike every other runescape private server, we listen to our players as they are of extreme importance.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=2]Let us begin to see an insight of what gaming at Tavlonia is like:[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3][COLOR="#FF0000"]
Player VS Player (PvP) Combat[/COLOR]
[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]For beginner PKers, we have a spawn tab of which they can choose FOR FREE a Melee Set, Hybrid Set, Mage Set, Range Set, Pure Set and ::Food!
[/SIZE]

[SIZE=2]PvP at Tavlonia is our main speciality. We encourage our gamers to PK as much as possible, and that is why you will find PKing at Tavlonia is probably the most Advanced type of PKing you will find on a Runescape Private Server. Not only do we have so many various PK areas (Including: Safe PvP (Do not Lose Items), High Risk PK (Minimum of 50m to enter), Multi PvP and Single PvP). But we also have unique features such as a unique[COLOR="#00FF00"] KILLSTREAK system [/COLOR] where if a successful PKer kills many people in a row, he will obtain a killstreak which will be announced to players. He will therefore, gain more PvP Tokens and More GP per kill! However, a PKer with a killstreak is also worth more money to other players. He will become a bounty target to everyone online! Therefore, if you kill somebody who is a bounty, you will receive more rewards for your kill!

               [/SIZE]                                                                   [img]http://i.imgur.com/Fq6kkgf.png[/img]
                                                                                  [img]http://i.imgur.com/lY8svaE.png[/img]

MruQnUr.png763×506

bshK8wu.png762×509

[SIZE=2][COLOR="#00FF00"]As a PK Server, we have adapted our shops to suit the needs of PKers through suggestions on our forums. We have many shops, here are some of them:
[/SIZE]
[/COLOR]

[COLOR="#00FF00"][SIZE=2]Here is our F2P PK Area and our High Risk PK Area[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[SIZE=2]Now… For all of you who are too scared for player vs player combat. Ofcourse Tavlonia provides Flawless PvM for you!
[/SIZE][SIZE=3][COLOR="#00FF00"]PvM At Tavlonia[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]Our PvM system provides bosses from all over RuneScape from easy bosses for the Newbies to hard bosses for the solid gamers! However, Tavlonia also has it’s Custom, unique bosses which are Explicit to tavlonia! Here is some pics of our PvM
[/SIZE]

v4iev6I.png766×453 

                                                                                  [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HOo9PbU.png[/img]

                                                                                  [img]http://i.imgur.com/lN2pVeI.png[/img]

[SIZE=3][COLOR="#00FF00"]
[SIZE=2]We also have our own Custom Developed Castle Wars ! It is identical to Runescape ! Pefectly working, with rewards… you won’t find that anywhere other than at Tavlonia…

          [/SIZE]  [/COLOR][/SIZE]                                                  
                                                                                   [img]http://i.imgur.com/FmVS336.png[/img]

                                                                                  [img]http://i.imgur.com/wxu1zEe.png[/img]

[SIZE=2][COLOR="#00FF00"]We have recently developed a new Rank System and added a few custom ranks (ALL WITH ICONS)![/COLOR]
We have the following:

Owner/Creator
Manager
Administrator

Player Support

So, if you haven’t already clicked our links, i suggest that you should:

                                             [/SIZE]                                    [img]http://i.imgur.com/S40gPWK.png[/img]
